rules.title: Bucket naming rules:
rules.length: Bucket names must be between 3 and 63 characters long
rules.characters: Bucket names can consist only of lowercase letters, numbers, dots (.), and hyphens (-)
rules.startEnd: Bucket names must begin and end with a letter or number

rules.noIp: Bucket names must not be formatted as an IP address (for example, 192.168.5.4)
rules.unique: Bucket names must be unique within the current configuration
